attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment has a duty of care to ensure the safety of the people who drive in the uk.Eleven months age my husband was killed by a foreign driver who was said to be on the wrong side of the road.It is fact that some countries in the EU are not conforming to the current legistration that we do regarding the road worthiness of these vehicles and the driving standards of the drivers.I am  calling for these trucks and drivers to be stopped from entering the uk to cause death,  serious injury, and may hem.
